title: Political parties to meet elections commission
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Secretaries of the Political Parties are to be summoned to the Election Commission on Monday (6) at 10.00 AM.
The Commission said the meeting will be convened to discuss the Socio-political environment and situation in the country.
The Election Commission sent a letter containing proposals on the current situation in the country to all political parties.
Meanwhile, the commission said it hopes to certify the 2022 voter list by October 31, 2022.
